mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO AS terminalSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, NOUSE_JISA_CODE AS nouseJisaCode, NOUSE_BRANCH_NO AS nouseBranchNo, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE AS nouseCornerCode, NOUSE_TERMINAL_NO AS nouseTerminalNo, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS terminalCorpCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE AS hireTerminalEnable, NOUSE_GUBUN AS nouseGubun, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME AS workPlanDatetime FROM ATMS_02001140

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO AS terminalSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, NOUSE_JISA_CODE AS nouseJisaCode, NOUSE_BRANCH_NO AS nouseBranchNo, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE AS nouseCornerCode, NOUSE_TERMINAL_NO AS nouseTerminalNo, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS terminalCorpCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE AS hireTerminalEnable, NOUSE_GUBUN AS nouseGubun, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME AS workPlanDatetime FROM ATMS_02001140 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001140 SET TERMINAL_SEQ_NO = #{terminalSeqNo}, CHANGE_CHASU = #{changeChasu}, STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, NOUSE_JISA_CODE = #{nouseJisaCode}, NOUSE_BRANCH_NO = #{nouseBranchNo}, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE = #{nouseCornerCode}, NOUSE_TERMINAL_NO = #{nouseTerminalNo}, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE = #{terminalCorpCode}, MODEL_CODE = #{modelCode}, HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE = #{hireTerminalEnable}, NOUSE_GUBUN = #{nouseGubun}, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME = #{workPlanDatetime} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001140 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO, CHANGE_CHASU, STEXT_GUBUN, NOUSE_JISA_CODE, NOUSE_BRANCH_NO, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE, NOUSE_TERMINAL_NO, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE, MODEL_CODE, HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE, NOUSE_GUBUN, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{terminalSeqNo}, #{changeChasu}, #{stextGubun}, #{nouseJisaCode}, #{nouseBranchNo}, #{nouseCornerCode}, #{nouseTerminalNo}, #{terminalCorpCode}, #{modelCode}, #{hireTerminalEnable}, #{nouseGubun}, #{workPlanDatetime} )
